CustomField.description: Friendly name displayed in timeline component for the conversation notes.
CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(CRM_Theme_Group__c), 'Ã˜vrige', IF(AND(NOT(ISBLANK(CRM_Theme__c)),(CRM_Theme__r.Name != 'Pensjon')), CRM_Theme_Group__r.Name + ', ' + CRM_Theme__r.Name, IF(AND(NOT(ISBLANK(CRM_Subtheme__c)),(CRM_Theme__r.Name == 'Pensjon')), CRM_Theme_Group__r.Name + ', ' + CRM_Subtheme__r.Name,CRM_Theme_Group__r.Name))) + IF(ISBLANK(CRM_Created_By_NAV_Unit__c), '', ' - ' + CRM_Created_By_NAV_Unit__c) + ' (' + CRM_Is_Read_Formula__c + ')'
CustomField.label: Timeline Name
